title: Terri Rebmann
description: Terri Rebmann, professor of biosecurity, bioterrorism and disaster preparedness

One project example: Selection, Recruitment, and Management of Non-Hospital Closed Point of Dispensing (POD) Sites: A Qualitative Study. She was also actively involved with response to the COVID-19 pandemic. Dr. Rebmann has worked with St. Louis-based childcare agencies to assess vaccine uptake and individuals' attitudes and beliefs regarding vaccination among childcare staff and parents of children in childcare.
